mapper.select: select aa.*, aa.badnessNumber * 100 / bb.totalNumber as badnessRate, rownum as rowIndex from (select usr.id as id, usr.display_name as name, count(*) as passNumber, sum(cai.final_approval) as creditAmount, sum(ado.total_amount_overdraft) as overdraftPrincipal, count(0) as badnessNumber, sum(npls_info.verification_account) as badnessOverdraftPrincipal from wf_status_queue_record wsqr inner join sys_user usr on wsqr.examine_user = usr.id inner join node_audit node_audit on wsqr.current_status = node_audit.id and node_audit.type = 'approved' and node_audit.seq_no in (1, 3) and node_audit.node_type = 'Product' and node_audit.product_id=#{productId} left join customer_application_process cap on cap.serial_number = wsqr.current_process left join customer_application_info cai on cai.id = cap.application_id left join customer_account_information account_info on account_info.card_number = cai.card_number left join average_daily_overdraft ado on ado.account_number = account_info.account_number left join npls_information npls_info on npls_info.account_id = account_info.id group by usr.id, usr.display_name) aa inner join (select usr.id as id, usr.display_name as name, count(*) as totalNumber from wf_status_queue_record wsqr inner join sys_user usr on wsqr.examine_user = usr.id inner join node_audit node_audit on wsqr.current_status = node_audit.id and node_audit.node_type = 'Product' and node_audit.product_id=#{productId} left join customer_application_process cap on cap.serial_number = wsqr.current_process left join customer_application_info cai on cai.id = cap.application_id left join customer_account_information account_info on account_info.card_number = cai.card_number left join average_daily_overdraft ado on ado.account_number = account_info.account_number left join npls_information npls_info on npls_info.account_id = account_info.id group by usr.id, usr.display_name) bb on aa.id = bb.id
